nodes.text: A pilot competed in Podraces for Team Watto, a Podracing team, during the final years of the Galactic Republic. During the pilot's tenure, they had made friends with fellow pilot Clegg Holdfast. With guidance from the crew chief, the Toydarian Watto, the pilot was able to secure a victory in the Boonta Eve Classic.

The pilot first appeared in the 2012 video game Kinect Star Wars. Their appearance and name could be determined by the player, based on a number of presets. Because of this, the pilot is never actually mentioned by name in dialogue, and is never seen during cutscenes in between gameplay.
